text: Ara taderake bitarita karabena na, yara sakala-bikala sbiya palakartara ebadata kare, tamra santusti kamana kare. Tadera hisaba bindumatra'o apanara dayitbe naya ebam apanara hisaba bindumatra'o tadera dayitbe naya ye, apani taderake bitarita karabena. Natuba apani abicarakaridera antarbhukta haye yabena.
